Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.util

Class Sync

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.util.Sync
  • public class Sync
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utilities for:
    • Converting Thread-blocking calls into fiber suspendable calls using invoke(Supplier) methods
    • Creating handlers for vertx callbacks that support throwing SuspendExecution (i.e. checked exception that ensures your fiber will be instrumented) using suspendableHandler(SuspendableAction1)
    • Calling a fiber-synchronous method at a later time using defer(SuspendableAction1).
